website_summaries.verdict: Cecilio makes a variety of mid-priced, well-made violas suitable for any practice instrument, or for orchestral use. These are great violas for students or beginning players.
pros: One-year warranty, which isn’t included on some products
We like the inclusion of an electronic tuner, as well as the typically included case, horsehair bow and rosin cake.Solid, hand-carved spruce top, better-quality strings included
cons: More of an orange color than many models
Bow could be of better quality
Strings snap easily on some violas

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and service, the first time it was damaged in the mail but they replaced it after return. My daughter preformed with her viola, so I think this is a great buy at a good price for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan&Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Viola is good quality. Can see a bit of glue where it was bonded together but for the price its great. Sound was very out of tune out of the box. No instructions for tuner that comes with it. Had it tuned and sound is really good for the price of this. Case is super lightweight. Would recommend buying for a beginner student.
customer_reviews.author: Alex the great

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and case offers arm straps like back pack
customer_reviews.text: My son in middle school this is his 4th yr of Viola...time to step it up from starter Viola. So excited for him to hear the difference as he grows in his skills
customer_reviews.author: Robin bresley

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased overall with the purchase of this viola. The "A" string had snapped but the Manufacturer replaced quickly. My music instructor finds the tonal quality of this 16" model to be very pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Weberly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Instrument
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful instrument. I love playing it. Just be sure to invest in a new bow, the one that is included isn't so great. The viola itself is very nice, especially for the price. I was shocked.
customer_reviews.author: Laila Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good Viola, terrible Bow
customer_reviews.text: The viola is a good quality for the money but the hair on the bow is not fashioned well and within months of playing the entire bow had to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice,  complete set
customer_reviews.text: Nice, complete set, good quality for the price, including the bow. Extra set of strings and a really nice case. The tuner not user friendly
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn Bars

customer_reviews.title: Best entry level viola for its price
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly new to playing the viola, and I believe this is the best entry level viola one could possibly get at a good price. Out of the box, after tuning and putting rosin on the bow, the tone sounds phenomenal for a beginner viola.
customer_reviews.author: Erikson Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Buy I’ve made all year! Everything is as described
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check the body of the instrument
customer_reviews.text: The instrument is wonded and not in a good condition
customer_reviews.author: Hmg

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall, but a pain to have to re-tune ...
customer_reviews.text: strings keep coming loose. knobs begin to turn on their own... Nice overall, but a pain to have to re-tune every single time.
customer_reviews.author: Lora L Epperson

customer_reviews.title: worked only for two days !
customer_reviews.text: The Bow came apart in the second day that my son used it!
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: The A string snapped immediately. My daughter has been ...
customer_reviews.text: The A string snapped immediately. My daughter has been playing this instrument at school for a while and wanted her own one. I'll have to go to the local music store to get a replacement A string. Hoping the seller will send me a replacement string.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An absolutely amazing intermediate violin that really allows you to push your ...
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely amazing intermediate violin that really allows you to push your limits, as well as the limits of the violin! This instrument plays extremely well, tunes easily and nicely, and looks beautiful! The only reason this is getting a four star rating instead of five, is because I did not receive my extra set of strings that supposedly came with the instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not happy, doesn’t have a viola setting for the tuner. String broke when trying to tune. First try!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended, lacks quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheap case, 2 zippers (case and front pocket) broke by way of material fatigue after 1 week of use. Tried contacting the seller multiple times and they have not addressed the issue or remedied this. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I figured out the nut on the D string fine tuner was loose and there was no way to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get my viola, however I noticed there was a rattling when I picked it up and started playing it. After a few sessions of wondering what it was, I figured out the nut on the D string fine tuner was loose and there was no way to screw it into place. That was a bummer. I am in the process of hopefully getting a replacement to avoid having to go to the repair shop for something so minor. EDIT: The seller was able to ship me a new fine tuner to fix the problem!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Stillson

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The viola was pretty good considering how cheap it was. The Zippers broke really fast though, and the tuner isn't accurate and is slow. I would buy this if you are a beginner
customer_reviews.author: Xianghong Li

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent viola for the money! Didn't come with the extra set of strings though, I still give it a 5 though because I am thoroughly happy with it. The design is very nice and the viola has a quality feel about it. The sound is beautiful, I love the C-string so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cecilio CVA-500 Solidwood Ebony Fitted Viola with D'Addario Prelude Strings, Size 16-Inch
product_meta.description: Size:16-inch| Color:Satin AntiqueTeacher approved Cecilio CVA-500 viola features a hand carved solid spruce top and solid flamed maple back and sides. Finished with a beautiful satin antique finish and inlaid purfling. The CVA-500 viola is strung with a set of D'Addario Prelude Strings and is fitted with ebony fingerboard, pegs, chinrest, and tailpiece with nickel plated fine tuners. Viola package includes Cecilio chromatic tuner with metronome, a lightweight form fitting hard shell case with pockets and strap (making it convenient to carry to school or orchestra), a Brazil wood bow with unbleached genuine Mongolian horsehair, quality rosin cake, and a bridge. Buy with confidence as it comes with a 1- year warranty against any manufacturer's defects.
feature_bullets: Size 16 inch viola, solid hand-carved spruce top, flamed maple back & sides, beautiful inlaid purfling & satin antique finish
Strung with D'Addario Prelude Strings (Note: Does not include extra set of strings.)
Ebony fingerboard, pegs, chinrest, and tailpiece with 4 detachable nickel plated fine tuners
Includes: Cecilio chromatic tuner, a lightweight hard case, a Brazilwood bow with unbleached genuine Mongolian horsehair, quality rosin cake, and a bridge

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars33 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
